title: Recall Notification Report
summary: WASHINGTON, Aug. 16, 2012 - On-Cor Frozen Foods, a Geneva, Ill. establishment, is recalling approximately 605 pounds of frozen boneless rib-shaped patties with barbecue sauce because they may have been mispackaged and labeled as Salisbury steak products, the U.S. Department of Agriculture's Food Safety and...
impacted_products: 28-oz. packages of "On-Cor Gravy & 6 Salisbury Steaks made with chicken, pork and beef, Family Size" with the number "EST. 1044G" inside the USDA mark of inspection.
